body_html: I was recently able to freeze a graph using batch norm (via tf.layers.batch_normalization) and optimize it, although I had to use the graph transform tool to do the latter part and not the old optimization tool.
body_text: I was recently able to freeze a graph using batch norm (via tf.layers.batch_normalization) and optimize it, although I had to use the graph transform tool to do the latter part and not the old optimization tool.
body: I was recently able to freeze a graph using batch norm (via `tf.layers.batch_normalization`) and optimize it, although I had to use the [graph transform tool](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms/README.md) to do the latter part and not the old optimization tool.
